segments.text: My attention is drawn to the children, who are clearly up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced on that wobbly two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could tip over at any second, which makes me incredibly nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far, one hand already deep inside the "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, her hand outstretched, eagerly awaiting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their secret mission, completely engrossed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can practically see the forbidden sweetness in their eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for disaster, and not just the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to tell them how dangerous that unstable stool is!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is entirely unaware, still polishing her dish, lost in her world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost too perfect a setup for a classic household mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt; a fall from that height onto a wet floor would be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR
